bug.short_desc: Backport devlink shared buffer patches to iproute v4.6
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1224586 Backport of shared buffer configuration
Description of problem: Shared buffer functionality using devlink has been present in the kernel since version v4.7. However, despite f25 using the 4.8.y kernel, it's not possible to configure this functionality as f25 is using iproute v4.6.
Fix this by backporting the relevant patches to the f25 branch of iproute (attached).
Steps to Reproduce: 1. devlink sb
Actual results: Object "sb" not found
Expected results: Show shared buffer configuration.
iproute-4.6.0-5.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-f217d4cb6a

iproute-4.6.0-5.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-f217d4cb6a
iproute-4.6.0-5.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
